categories: Category:Star Wars: War of the Bounty Hunters

nodes.text: Darth Vader 15 is the upcoming fifteenth issue of the 2020 comic book series Star Wars: Darth Vader, and is part of the Star Wars: War of the Bounty Hunters event. The issue will be written by Greg Pak, illustrated by Raffaele Ienco, and published by Marvel Comics on August 25, 2021.
